meanings.definition: A person who studies or predicts future trends or developments.
meanings.sent1: The futurist presented a detailed analysis of upcoming technological advancements.
meanings.sent2: The company hired a futurist to help them anticipate market changes.
meanings.sent3: The futurist joked that they could predict the next big thing before it even happened.
meanings.sent4: She had a crystal ball like a futurist, foreseeing the trends before they emerged.
meanings.sent5: The futurist's insights were so accurate that they seemed almost magical.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the future or futurism.
meanings.sent1: The futurist approach to design focused on innovative solutions.
meanings.sent2: His futurist vision of the city included flying cars and smart buildings.
meanings.sent3: The futurist concept of fashion involved metallic fabrics and bold shapes.
meanings.sent4: Her style was described as futurist, with sleek lines and futuristic patterns.
meanings.sent5: The futurist architecture of the building made it stand out from the rest.
